sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Profile = ({user}) => { const {posts, messages, username} = user; console.log(posts[0].location) return (

Welcome, {username}!

Active Posts:

{(posts[0].title)}

Description:

{description}

Price:

{price}

Location:

{location}

) } export default Profile;
